caption: This is a live performance of an alternative R&B music piece. There is a female vocalist singing in a seductive manner in the lead. Later on, a male vocalist starts rapping. There is a groovy bass line in the background. The DJ is scratching the turntable. The rhythmic background is provided by an R&B acoustic drum beat. The atmosphere is sensual and the sound is urban. Sounds of the crowd cheering can be heard in the recording.
